name: Bouncy Cloud (itch)
description:
My first fully released game, it's a small & channeling arcade game where the goal is to capture the flag! Can you get a perfect score?

Play on Steam to access leaderboards:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1572910/Bouncy_Cloud/

In this challenging 2D arcade, you have one goal, capture the flag(s). Play through 20 plus levels to master your craft of the bounce, as you can only control your lateral movement and you will need to use the platforms to bounce to your goal. Test your skills in the Circuit, a 10 level challenge where you will need to capture the flag and collect stars to earn points. See how your score stacks up against your friends and other players as you climb the Leaderboards.
